plot: This 'rock and roll'-style documentary film explores the anime subculture in North America with footage from anime conventions and interviews with fans, voice actors and artists. Includes special feature content such as funny outtakes and advice for voice actor aspirants.   Written by  Martell, Carey
plot_en: This 'rock and roll'-style documentary film explores the anime subculture in North America with footage from anime conventions and interviews with fans, voice actors and artists. Includes special feature content such as funny outtakes and advice for voice actor aspirants.   Written by  Martell, Carey

title: Cosprayers
